name: Cyberpunk Surfer
description:
I was experimenting with applying RTX in Unity engine but accidentally it turned out to be Subway Surfers game with Cyberpunk 2077 theme.

A: move left

D: move right

W: jump

S: Slide

Avoid obstacles and hit max score.

Comment with your best score on the game Youtube video with a screen shot of your score to win a free AvoCuddle steam code for the top 3 best score.


You need nVidia 1060 GPU at least to run the game smoothly.
